import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import { Button, Table, Container, Row, Col } from "react-bootstrap"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import {getProfile} from "../../api"; const ProfileView = () => { const [profile, setProfile] = useState({}); useEffect(() => { refreshProfile(); }, []) const refreshProfile = async () => { const data = await getProfile(); setProfile(data); } return ( <>

Profile

Name Age Weight Height
{profile.name} {profile.age} {profile.weight} kg {profile.height} cm
) }; export default ProfileView;
